description: Make your own Tom and Jerry by bringing the classic to a&nbsp;holiday party. The premade batter is made with eggs, butter, sugar along with spices of choice for an incredible drink that's also perfect during unexpected guests who stop in unannounced.
name: Tom And Jerry
recipeIngredient: 1 to 2 tbsp. Tom and Jerry batter
4 to 6 oz. Hot milk, or water, or both; to taste

recipeInstructions.name: Add the cream of tartar to the egg whites. Whisk until a whipped cream consistency is achieved.

recipeInstructions.name: In the bowl with egg yolks, add the unsalted butter and sugar. Whip the ingredients together until combined.
